Articles.Content:
Okay, to be honest: I am not sure if this is hated, loved, already requested, or already made.

Wouldn't it be fun to have aliens or another A.I space program to compete with? This type of mod would make the game better for the hardcore and realistic players, because it would become somewhat like the space race of the Cold War. The Soviets got the world record for the first satellite and man in orbit, but the Americans got the first world record for a man on another celestial body. It could be transferred into KSP as lets say...

  • *Player* got the first object into space!
  • *A.I* got the first object into orbit!

Well, on @NathanKell's new YouTube series, he and other people are having a space race in RO. I do not know how it works though.

Other than that, i think its a great idea.
Maybe something with an RNG would be possible. Would there be bonuses for making it to places first? Would you both be going off of Kerbin?
